citations.narrative:
The outdoor area of a sheltered housing facility containing two adult white-throated capuchin monkeys is not completely
enclosed by a perimeter fence. The outdoor area of the enclosure has chain link walls and roof, beyond which there is
some additional fencing of various heights. The facility has made recent improvements to the fencing, however, there is
not one continuous 6 feet tall perimeter fence around the outside area of the monkey enclosure. A perimeter fence is
essential for preventing contact between exotic animals and unauthorized people or animals. A perimeter fence also acts
as a secondary containment system in the event an animal escapes from its primary enclosure. Correct by installing a
perimeter fence that is at least 6 feet tall around the outdoor area of the primate enclosure, or by obtaining approval from
the Administrator for alternative measures.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the owner.
Additional Inspectors:
Lynh Ly, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
3.77(f)  Repeat
   
Sheltered housing facilities. 
The outdoor area of a sheltered housing facility containing two adult white-throated capuchin monkeys is not completely 
enclosed by a perimeter fence. The outdoor area of the enclosure has chain link walls and roof, beyond which there is 
some additional fencing of various heights. The facility has made recent improvements to the fencing, however, there is 
not one continuous 6 feet tall perimeter fence around the outside area of the monkey enclosure. A perimeter fence is 
essential for preventing contact between exotic animals and unauthorized people or animals. A perimeter fence also acts 
as a secondary containment system in the event an animal escapes from its primary enclosure. Correct by installing a 
perimeter fence that is at least 6 feet tall around the outdoor area of the primate enclosure, or by obtaining approval from 
the Administrator for alternative measures. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the owner. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Lynh Ly, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
